oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Von persönlicher Energie zur Führerschaft, von der Führerschaft zum schöpferischen Reagieren -Schumpeters Arbeit am Unternehmerbegriff
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hedtke, Ulrich
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In May 2009 Ulrich Hedtke presented a paper at the Schumpeter School Kolloquium dealing with Schumpeter’s perception of the entrepreneur. In his paper he argues that Schumpeter’s concept of entrepreneurship changed over time, illustrates the transition of Schumpeter’s ideas, and discusses implications for research.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Schumpeter Discussion Papers SDP11008 ISSN 1867-5352 Published : June 2011
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Schumpeter
innovation
leadership
